name: Earthling Quota
description:
Sent down to abduct your daily quota of 5 Earthlings, you play as an alien in a predicament! If you can't get 5, you'll be fired for sure and then who knows what! Hint: look up!

Controls

Left Arrow/Right Arrow || A/D  :   move left and right

Up Arrow || W   :  jetpack jump

Down Arrow || S   :  move down platforms

Space to shoot
